message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an introductory price of $120. This exceptional value won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in your product, but $120 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay right now. I'd be happy to pay $90 for it.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. In light of your offer, I am willing to negotiate further. For today only, I am offering the product for $100. This is my best offer, as it still allows me to maintain a reasonable profit margin.
